description:
"The few months before Yuki moved were the first point of connection between us." Yuki`s past, and the reason why she became an idol, are revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And Thus We Sit Together Now, and All Night Long We Have Not Stirred.
Bokutachi wa Issho ni Suwatte Iru, Hitobanjuu, Ugoku Koto mo Naku
僕達は一緒に座っている, 一晩中, 動くこともなく
